created_at_utc.description: UTC timestamp when this record was created (Z-suffix required by determinism standard).

event_time_utc.description: UTC timestamp of the broker-reported event occurrence (Z-suffix required by determinism standard).

broker_order_id.description: Broker-assigned order identifier (string to avoid loss of leading zeros / format drift).

perm_id.description: Broker permanent identifier when available (normalized as string).

status.description: Normalized status transition for lifecycle ingestion.

filled_qty.description: Cumulative filled quantity as of this event.

avg_price.description: Average fill price as decimal string (normalized).

raw_broker_status.description: Optional raw broker status text for forensic traceability.

raw_payload_digest.description: Optional SHA-256 digest of raw broker event payload after canonical capture (if captured).

sequence_num.description: Optional monotonic sequence number if provided by adapter boundary.

upstream_hash.description: Optional pointer to upstream event hash when chaining events deterministically.
